title: Fitness for living: how to get fit
creator_credit: Eric Horter and Walt Disney Educational Media Company
brief_description: This film shows ways of getting fit and suggests that regular practice of specific exercises is the key to developing strength and endurance; that slow continuous exercise such as jogging or bicycling develops the heart and lungs; that weight training augments muscle strength. Suitable for secondary level.
